channel.title: I wanna be like mommy lol
channel.description:
[img]http://mail.google.com/mail/?ui=2&ik=d8acb48d4a&view=att&th=11f0c0ed5cf0dc8d&attid=0.1.1&disp=emb&zw[/img] Edit: If you cant see it
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dtysuv.jpg[/img] (Here's the reply the teacher received the following day)
Dear Mrs. Jones, I wish to clarify that I am not now, nor have I ever been, an exotic dancer. I work at Home Depot and I told my daughter how hectic it was last week before the blizzard hit. I told her we sold out every single shovel we had, and then I found one more in the back room, and that several people were fighting over who would get it. Her picture doesn't show me dancing around a pole. It's supposed to depict me selling the last snow shovel we had at Home Depot. From now on I will remember to check her homework more thoroughly before she turns it in. Sincerely, Mrs. Smith

item.title: I wanna be like mommy lol
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

I’ve never heard that reply to that picture before… So I’m sure it’s fake.

Read full topic

item.title: I wanna be like mommy lol
item.dc:creator: @Lil_Goon Lil Goon
item.description:
@Lil_Goon wrote:


Edit: If you cant see it


(Here’s the reply the teacher received the following day)

Dear Mrs. Jones,
I wish to clarify that I am not now, nor have I ever been, an exotic dancer.
I work at Home Depot and I told my daughter how hectic it was last week before the blizzard hit. I told her we sold out every single shovel we had, and then I found one more in the back room, and that several people were fighting over who would get it. Her picture doesn’t show me dancing around a pole. It’s supposed to depict me selling the last snow shovel we had at Home Depot.
From now on I will remember to check her homework more thoroughly before she turns it in.
Sincerely,
Mrs. Smith
